title: Create and initialize int array - describe error

content.question: Which of the following best explains why the code segment does not work as intended?

choices.label: The assignment statements for the array elements are in the wrong order.
The size of the array cannot be changed once the array is created.
The element nums[1] is assigned two different values.
The element nums[2] is never set to 0.

content.answer: The size of the array cannot be changed once the array is created.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
